sense.gloss: singing in unison, chanting in unison
simultaneously, all at once, in unison
to put in order, to arrange, to tidy up, to fix, to straighten
to get ready, to prepare, to arrange, to supply, to assemble, to buy
to adjust, to regulate (e.g. rhythm, tune, one's breathing)
to work out (e.g. business deal), to arrange (e.g. marriage), to settle
just as ..., as soon as ..., the moment (that) ..., immediately upon ...
Qi (kingdom in China during the Spring and Autumn Period and the Period of the Warring States), Ch'i
to be ready, to be prepared, to be arranged
to be in order, to be put in order, to be well-ordered, to be well-proportioned, to be harmonious
to be adjusted, to be regulated, to be refined (e.g. of a face)
to be settled (e.g. treaty, contract), to be completed
let a hundred flowers blossom, Hundred Flowers campaign
irregularity, unevenness, asymmetry, lack of uniformity
simultaneous transmission, sending to multiple recipients, sending a group message
Southern Qi dynasty (of China; 479-502 CE), Southern Ch'i dynasty
Northern Qi dynasty (of China; 550-577), Northern Ch'i dynasty

sdata.j: ↑教会↑↓きょうかい↓の↑鐘↑↓かね↓が↑一斉↑↓いっせい↓に↑鳴↑↓な↓り↑出↑↓だ↓した。
sdata.e: All the church bells started ringing together.

sdata.j: ↑学生↑↓がくせい↓は↑皆↑↓みな↓↑一斉↑↓いっせい↓に↑立↑↓た↓ち↑上↑↓あ↓がった。
sdata.e: All of the students stood up together.

sdata.j: ↑市長↑↓しちょう↓の↑人気↑↓にんき↓が↑落↑↓お↓ち↑目↑↓め↓になった↑途端↑↓とたん↓に、↑一斉↑↓いっせい↓に↑彼↑↓かれ↓に↑対↑↓たい↓する↑批判↑↓ひはん↓が↑噴↑↓ふ↓き↑出↑↓だ↓してきた。
sdata.e: As soon as they realized the mayor was on his way down, his critics started coming out of the woodwork.

sdata.j: ↑乗客↑↓じょうきゃく↓が↑一斉↑↓いっせい↓に↑乗↑↓の↓ってきた。
sdata.e: The passengers came on board all at the same time.

sdata.j: ↑新聞↑↓しんぶん↓は↑一斉↑↓いっせい↓にその↑政治↑↓せいじ↓↑家↑↓か↓をたたきはじめた。
sdata.e: The newspapers opened fire on the politician.

sdata.j: ↑人々↑↓ひとびと↓が↑一斉↑↓いっせい↓に↑走↑↓はし↓り↑出↑↓だ↓した。
sdata.e: People started to run all at once.

sdata.j: ↑聴衆↑↓ちょうしゅう↓の↑誰↑↓だれ↓もが↑一斉↑↓いっせい↓にどっと↑笑↑↓わら↓った。
sdata.e: Everyone in the audience burst into simultaneous laughter.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓らは↑一斉↑↓いっせい↓にスタートした。
↑彼↑↓かれ↓らは↑一斉↑↓いっせい↓に↑立↑↓た↓ち↑上↑↓あ↓がった。
↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑均斉↑↓きんせい↓のとれた↑姿↑↓すがた↓をしている。
予鈴だ。↑校門↑↓こうもん↓の↑辺↑↓あた↓りにいた↑生徒↑↓せいと↓たちが↑一斉↑↓いっせい↓に↑足↑↓あし↓を↑速↑↓はや↓める。
sdata.e: It's the class bell. The pupils that had been around the school gate quickened their steps as one.

sdata.j: 「ワンワンッ！」「ニャーニャー！」「コケコッコー！」と、↑動物↑↓どうぶつ↓たちが↑一斉↑↓いっせい↓に↑鳴↑↓な↓き↑始↑↓はじ↓めた。
sdata.e: The various animals started going, "Woof, woof!" and "Meow, meow!" and "Cock-a-doodle-doo!"

sdata.j: みんなで↑一斉↑↓いっせい↓に↑水↑↓みず↓に↑飛↑↓と↓び↑込↑↓こ↓んだんだ。
sdata.e: We all jumped into the water at the same time.

sdata.j: ↑皆↑↓みな↓が↑一斉↑↓いっせい↓に↑喋↑↓しゃべ↓っています。
sdata.e: Everyone is talking at the same time.

sdata.j: ↑生徒↑↓せいと↓↑全員↑↓ぜんいん↓が↑一斉↑↓いっせい↓に↑立↑↓た↓ち↑上↑↓あ↓がった。
sdata.e: All of the students stood up together.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓らは↑一斉↑↓いっせい↓に↑笑↑↓わら↓い↑始↑↓はじ↓めた。
sdata.e: All at once they began to laugh.

sdata.j: ↑一斉↑↓いっせい↓にいやな↑視線↑↓しせん↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓りかかって↑来↑↓き↓た。
sdata.e: I felt everyone's glare land on me all at once.
